summary: Ever wanted Auri-El\'s Armor, Sword, and Crown.
descriptionHtml:
Mod does not require Dawnguard to function, but does for authenticity.

	Ever wanted Auri-El\'s Armor, Sword, and Crown. Someone stole them from the Inner Sanctum some time ago, but was struck down when he raised his fist in diffidence to the Heaven.

	The Armor and Sword are now locked in a Crystal at Deep Folk Crossing (See Picture).
	Being the Sword of Auri-El Himself, it is recommended that you use wisdom in handling it lest you also be struck down.

	The armor is just re-textured Daedric Armor, but it was the closest thing to what I could see of the culture of the Aedra Auri-El.

[center][youtube]7Pn-_8QjBvE[/youtube][/center]

	I have now also made the Crown of Auriel.
author: stormshallow
